feed.title: Track Awesome Ros2 Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: The Robot Operating System Version 2.0 is awesome!

entry.title: Awesome Ros2 Updates on Jan 16 - Jan 22, 2023
entry.content:
Presentations / ROSCon 2022

  • Panel: The ROS 2 Developer Experience video
  • Wearable ROS: Development of wearable robot system using ROS 2 video slides
  • Building ROS 2 enabled Android apps with C++ video slides
  • Distributed Robotics Simulator with Unreal Engine video slides
  • Tools and processes for improving the certifiability of ROS 2 video slides
  • Failover ROS Framework : Consensus-based node redundancy video slides
  • ROS 2 and Gazebo Integration Best Practices video slides
  • Chain-Aware ROS Evaluation Tool (CARET) video slides
  • ROS 2 network monitoring video slides
  • How custom tasks are defined, assigned, and executed in Open-RMF video slides
  • A practitioner's guide to ros2_control video slides
  • Zenoh: How to Make ROS 2 Work at any Scale and Integrate with Anything video slides
  • A case study in optics manufacturing with MoveIt2 and ros2_control video slides
  • 20/20 Robot Vision - How to setup cameras in ROS 1 & ROS 2 using camera_aravis video slides
  • Filter your ROS 2 content video slides
  • Evolving Message Types, and Other Interfaces, Over Time video slides
  • Migrating from ROS1 to ROS 2 - choosing the right bridge video slides
  • On Use of Nav2 Smac Planners video slides
  • Bazel and ROS 2 – building large scale safety applications video slides
  • Native Rust components for ROS 2 video slides
  • The ROS build farm and you: How ROS packages you release become binary packages. video slides
  • mROS 2: yet another runtime environment onto embedded devices video slides
  • ROS 2 & Edge Impulse: Embedded AI in robotics applications video slides
  • micro-ROS goes Automotive: supporting AUTOSAR-based microcontrollers video slides
  • An open architecture for Hardware Acceleration in ROS 2 video slides
  • ROS 2 and the Crazyflie: Aerial swarms and Autonomy with a tiny flying robot video slides
  • A Raspberry Pi image with ROS 2 + RT and a customizable image builder video slides
entry.summary: 27 awesome projects updated on Jan 16 - Jan 22, 2023

entry.title: Awesome Ros2 Updates on Dec 05 - Dec 11, 2022
entry.content:
Packages / Ecosystem

  • urdfdom (⭐108) - URDF (U-Robot Description Format) library which provides core data structures and a simple XML parser
  • urdfdom_headers (⭐31) - Headers for URDF parsers.

Packages / Driver layer

  • duro_gps_driver (⭐16) - ROS/ROS2 driver for SwiftNav Duro Inertial GPS / GNSS receivers

entry.title: Awesome Ros2 Updates on May 10 - May 16, 2021
entry.content:
Packages / Middleware

  • Eclipse Zenoh (⭐2k) - Zenoh is a scalable and extremely performant protocol that can be used transparently used to interact with ROS2 applications as well as for R2X communication. (https://img.shields.io/github/stars/eclipse-zenoh/zenoh)
  • Eclipse Zenoh-Plugin-DDS (⭐178) - This is a zenoh plugin that allows to transparently route ROS2/DDS data over zenoh. This is commonly used for R2X communication over Wireless network or across the Internet. (https://img.shields.io/github/stars/eclipse-zenoh/zenoh-plugin-dds)
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on May 10 - May 16, 2021

entry.title: Awesome Ros2 Updates on Jul 27 - Aug 02, 2020
entry.content:
Packages / Application layer

  • ros2-ORB_SLAM2 (⭐153) - ROS2 node wrapping the ORB_SLAM2 library.
  • basalt_ros2 (⭐17) - ROS2 wrapper for Basalt VIO.
  • slam_gmapping (⭐163) - Slam Gmapping for ROS2.
  • slam_toolbox (⭐2k) - Slam Toolbox for lifelong mapping and localization in potentially massive maps with ROS.
  • lidarslam_ros2 (⭐654) - ROS2 package of 3D lidar slam using ndt/gicp registration and pose-optimization.
  • li_slam_ros2 (⭐366) - ROS2 package of tightly-coupled lidar inertial ndt/gicp slam referenced from LIO-SAM.

Packages / Driver layer

  • ros2_ouster_drivers (⭐142) - ROS2 Drivers for the Ouster OS-1 Lidars.

entry.title: Awesome Ros2 Updates on Jul 15 - Jul 21, 2019
entry.content:

  • micro-ROS/docker (⭐54) - Docker-related material to setup, configure and develop with micro-ROS hardware.

  • apriltag_ros (⭐228) - ROS2 node for AprilTag detection.

Packages / Driver layer

  • ros2_xmlrpc_interface (⭐0) - ros2 interface package with xmlrpc, to communicate with a Sesto server using Sesto API.
  • HRIM (⭐69) - A standard interface for robot modules.

Packages / DDS communication mechanism implementations

  • Connext DDS - Connectivity Software for Developing and Integrating IIoT Systems. 💲

Operating systems / Build system (ROS2)

  • NuttX (⭐90) - NuttX fork of the official one for use with micro-ROS.

Documentation / Build system (ROS2)

  • ROS2 CLI cheats sheet (⭐174) - A cheats sheet for ROS 2 Command Line Interface.

entry.title: Awesome Ros2 Updates on May 13 - May 19, 2019
entry.content:
Packages / Application layer

  • system-modes (⭐47) - System modes for ROS 2 and micro-ROS.

Packages / Middleware

  • Micro XRCE-DDS Agent (⭐134) - Micro XRCE-DDS Agent acts as a server between DDS Network and Micro XRCE-DDS Clients.
  • Micro XRCE-DDS Agent docker - Docker image containing the Micro XRCE-DDS Agent.
  • Micro XRCE-DDS Client (⭐147) - Micro XRCE-DDS implements a client-server protocol to enable resource-constrained devices (clients) to take part in DDS communications.
  • micro-ROS-Agent (⭐136) - ROS 2 package using Micro XRCE-DDS Agent.

Packages / Driver layer

  • micro-ROS/hardware - Information and documentation about the hardware platforms used and supported in the micro-ROS project.
entry.summary: 6 awesome projects updated on May 13 - May 19, 2019

entry.title: Awesome Ros2 Updates on Apr 29 - May 05, 2019
entry.content:
Packages / Application layer

  • Autoware.Auto - Autoware.Auto provides an open-source software stack based on ROS 2 for self-driving technology.

Packages / Driver layer

  • Autoware.IO - Autoware.IO provides a heterogeneous hardware reference platform and enables the integration of member company's solutions onto platforms which support the Autoware.Auto and Autoware.AI software stack.
  • zed-ros2-wrapper (⭐232) - ROS 2 wrapper beta for the ZED SDK.
  • ros2_denso_radar (⭐9) - Toyota/Lexus 2015-2017 Denso Radar driver for ROS2.
  • sick_scan2 (⭐56) - ROS2 driver for the SICK TiM series of laser scanners (TiM551/TiM561/TiM571).

Courses / Build system (ROS2)

  • ROS 2 Basics in 5 Days (C++) - Learn how to start working with ROS 2 (The Construct)
entry.summary: 6 awesome projects updated on Apr 29 - May 05, 2019

entry.title: Awesome Ros2 Updates on Mar 04 - Mar 10, 2019
entry.content:
Packages / Demonstrations

  • adlink_ddsbot (⭐41) - The ROS 2.0/1.0 based robots swarm architecture (opensplice DDS).
  • adlink_neuronbot (⭐15) - ROS2/DDS robot pkg for human following and swarm.
  • turtlebot3 (⭐1.7k) - ROS2 based TurtleBot3 demo including Bringup, Teleop and Cartographer.

Packages / Examples

  • turtlebot2_demo (⭐99) - TurtleBot 2 demos using ROS 2.
  • examples/rclcpp (⭐804) - C++ examples.
  • examples/rclpy (⭐804) - Python examples.
  • rcljava_examples (⭐15) - Package containing examples of how to use the rcljava API.

Packages / Benchmarking

  • ros2_benchmarking (⭐48) - Framework for ROS2 benchmarking. ROS2 communication characteristics can be evaluated on several axes, quickly and in an automated way.
  • performance_test (⭐65) - Test performance and latency of various communication means like ROS 2, FastRTPS and Connext DDS Micro.

Packages / Containerization

  • docker-ros2-ospl-ce (⭐10) - A dockerfile to build a ROS2 + OpenSplice CE container.
  • ros2_java_docker (⭐6) - Dockerfiles for building ros2_java with OpenJDK and Android.

Packages / Ecosystem

  • rosbag2 (⭐340) - ROS2 native rosbag.
  • rviz (⭐374) - 3D Robot Visualizer.
  • ros2cli (⭐213) - ROS 2 command line tools.
  • orocos_kinematics_dynamics (⭐9) - Orocos Kinematics and Dynamics C++ library.
  • pydds (⭐25) - Simple DDS Python API for Vortex Lite and for OpenSplice.

Packages / Application layer

  • ros2_control (⭐656) - ros2_control is a proof of concept on how new features within ROS 2 can be elaborated and used in the context of robot control (ros2_controllers).
  • ros2_controllers (⭐507) - Description of ros_controllers.
  • geometry2 (⭐140) - A set of ROS packages for keeping track of coordinate transforms.
  • cartographer (⭐105) - Real-time simultaneous localization and mapping (SLAM) in 2D and 3D across multiple platforms and sensor configurations.
  • teleop_twist_keyboard (⭐43) - Generic Keyboard Teleop for ROS2.
  • teleop_twist_joy (⭐68) - Simple joystick teleop for twist robots.
  • diagnostics (⭐1) - Forked version of the original ROS1 Diagnostics for ROS 2 (currently diagnostics_updater only).
  • robot_state_publisher (⭐4) - Forked version of the original ROS Robot State Publisher with all modifications to compile within a ROS2 Ecosystem.
  • common_interfaces (⭐293) - A set of packages which contain common interface files (.msg and .srv).
  • ros2_object_map (⭐14) - "Mark tag of objects on map when SLAM".
  • ros2_object_analytics (⭐103) - Object Analytics (OA) is ROS2 wrapper for realtime object detection, localization and tracking.
  • ros2_intel_movidius_ncs (⭐26) - ROS2 wrapper for Movidius™ Neural Compute Stick (NCS) Neuronal Compute API.
  • ros2_moving_object (⭐5) - Addressing moving objects based on messages generated by Object Analytics ros2_object_analytics.
  • ros2_openvino_toolkit (⭐176) - ROS2 wrapper for CV API of OpenVINO™ (human vision emulation).
  • ros2_grasp_library (⭐211) - Probably a grasp library :).
  • ros2_message_filters (⭐21) - ros2_message_filters blends various messages based on the conditions that filter needs to met and derives from ROS2 porting of ROS message_filters.
  • ros2-tensorflow (⭐60) - ROS2 nodes for computer vision tasks in Tensorflow.
  • pid (⭐15) - A PID controller for ROS2.

Packages / "System" bindings

  • rclandroid (⭐4) - Android API for ROS2.
  • riot-ros2 (⭐25) - This project enables ROS2 to run on microcontrollers using the RIOT Operating System.

Packages / Client libraries

  • rclnodejs (⭐368) - ROS Client Library for Node.js.
  • rclada (⭐11) - ROS Client Library for Ada.
  • rclcpp (⭐627) - ROS Client Library for C++.
  • rclgo (⭐55) - ROS Client Library for Go.
  • rclpy (⭐359) - ROS Client Library for Python.
  • rcljava (⭐17) - ROS Client Library for Java.
  • rclobjc (⭐31) - ROS Client Library for Objective C (for iOS).
  • rclc (⭐134) - ROS Client Library for C.
  • ros2_dotnet (⭐161) - .NET bindings for ROS2.

Packages / Driver layer

  • cozmo_driver_ros2 (⭐5) - Unofficial Anki Cozmo node for ROS2.
  • sphero_ros2 (⭐1) - ROS2 sphero driver.
  • flock2 (⭐67) - ROS2 driver for DJI Tello drones.
  • ros2_raspicam_node (⭐10) - ROS2 node for Raspberry Pi camera.
  • joystick_drivers (⭐5) - ROS2 drivers for joysticks.
  • joystick_drivers_from_scratch (⭐1) - Joystick driver packages for ROS 2.
  • joystick_ros2 (⭐60) - Joystick driver for ROS2, support all platforms: Linux, macOS, Windows.
  • ros2_teleop_keyboard (⭐23) - Teleop Twist Keyboard for ROS2.
  • ros_astra_camera (⭐10) - ROS2 wrapper for Astra camera.
  • ros2_usb_camera (⭐95) - ROS2 General USB camera driver.
  • ros2_android_drivers (⭐2) - Collection of ROS2 drivers for several Android sensors.
  • ros2_intel_realsense (⭐145) - ROS2 Wrapper for Intel® RealSense™ Devices.
  • raspicam2_node (⭐43) - ROS2 node for camera module of Raspberry Pi.
  • FIROS2 (⭐8) - ROS2 integrable tool focused in the intercommunication between ROS2 and FIWARE.
  • lino2_upper - Linorobot on ROS2.
  • RysROS2 (⭐4) - ROS2 software stack for MiniRys robots.
  • px4_to_ros (⭐27) - ROS2/ROS packages for communicate PX4 with ROS.
  • multiwii_ros2 (⭐12) - ROS2 Node for MultiWii and Cleanflight flight controllers.
  • ydlidar_ros2 (⭐2) - ROS2 wrapper for ydlidar.

Packages / Client libraries common

  • rcl (⭐140) - Library to support implementation of language specific ROS Client Libraries.
  • system_tests (⭐42) - Tests for rclcpp and rclpy.
  • rcl_interfaces (⭐51) - A repository for messages and services used by the ROS client libraries.

Packages / IDL generators

  • rosidl_generator_java (⭐17) - Generate the ROS interfaces in Java.
  • rosidl_generator_objc (⭐31) - Generate the ROS interfaces in Objective C.
  • rosidl_generator_cpp (⭐93) - Generate the ROS interfaces in C++.
  • rosidl_generator_c (⭐93) - Generate the ROS interfaces in C.
  • rosidl (⭐93) - Packages which provide the ROS IDL (.msg) definition and code generation.
  • rosidl_dds (⭐8) - Generate the DDS interfaces for ROS interfaces.

Packages / RMW (ROS middleware)

  • rmw (⭐105) - Contains the ROS middleware API.
  • rmw_connext_cpp (⭐27) - Implement the ROS middleware interface using RTI Connext static code generation in C++.
  • rmw_fastrtps_cpp (⭐177) - Implement the ROS middleware interface using eProsima FastRTPS static code generation in C++.
  • rmw_dps (⭐26) - Implementation of the ROS Middleware (rmw) Interface using Intel's Distributed Publish & Subscribe.
  • rmw_opensplice_cpp (⭐12) - Implement the ROS middleware interface using PrismTech OpenSplice static code generation in C++.
  • rmw_coredx (⭐0) - CoreDX DDS integration layer for ROS2.
  • rmw_freertps (⭐1) - RMW implementation using freertps.
  • rcutils (⭐64) - Common C functions and data structures used in ROS 2.
  • rmw_cyclonedds (⭐136) - ROS2 RMW layer for Eclipse Cyclone DDS.

Packages / DDS communication mechanism implementations

  • freertps (⭐92) - A free, portable, minimalist, work-in-progress RTPS implementation.
  • Fast-RTPS (⭐2.5k) - Implementation of RTPS Standard (RTPS is the wire interoperability protocol for DDS).
  • OpenSplice (⭐269) - Implementation of the OMG DDS Standard. 💲
  • CoreDX DDS - Implementation of Twin Oaks Computing, Inc.. 💲
  • cdds (⭐8) - Cyclone DDS is developed completely in the open and is undergoing the acceptance process to become part of Eclipse IoT.
  • Micro-XRCE-DDS) (⭐170) - An XRCE DDS implementation (supported by microROS).

Packages / Build system (Linux)

  • meta-ros2 (⭐19) - ROS 2 Layer for OpenEmbedded Linux.

Packages / Build system (ROS2)

  • ci (⭐50) - ROS 2 CI Infrastructure.
  • ament_cmake_export_jars (⭐17) - The ability to export Java archives to downstream packages in the ament buildsystem in CMake.
  • rmw_implementation_cmake (⭐105) - CMake functions which can discover and enumerate available implementations.
  • rmw_implementation (⭐24) - CMake infrastructure and dependencies for rmw implementations.

Papers / ROSCon 2015

  • Introducting the Robot Security Framework (RSF), A standardized methodology to perform security assessments in robotics
  • Towards an open standard for assessing the severity of robot security vulnerabilities, The Robot Vulnerability Scoring System (RVSS)
entry.summary: 95 awesome projects updated on Mar 04 - Mar 10, 2019
